about_the_game:
*Includes both the Tutorial & Chapter 1.

>HAL_4 is a singleplayer action-puzzle horror game.

In another dimension...

Enter the Devil's Garden; a mysterious network of interdimensional tunnels located beneath the abandoned town of GladderVines; contained and monitored by an organization known as the Ludic Foundation which specializes in researching paranormal phenomena.

The Rise of Another Silent Protagonist™

Diagnostic Technician "Halister Murdock" finds himself separated from his expedition team after they were dispatched to investigate the depths of the West Research Facility which is suspected to have been compromised by the Devil’s Garden.

Now he must escape using the Ludic Foundation's prototype Gravity Boots which allow him to walk on many surfaces, reach high places, and even fling himself through the air!

Boogle Scoobity Bloobity Spaalonebabuguuscooties

Are you actually reading this?

content_descriptors.notes: Occasional allusions to victims of abuse or abusive relationships.

detailed_description:
*Includes both the Tutorial & Chapter 1.

>HAL_4 is a singleplayer action-puzzle horror game.

In another dimension...

Enter the Devil's Garden; a mysterious network of interdimensional tunnels located beneath the abandoned town of GladderVines; contained and monitored by an organization known as the Ludic Foundation which specializes in researching paranormal phenomena.

The Rise of Another Silent Protagonist™

Diagnostic Technician "Halister Murdock" finds himself separated from his expedition team after they were dispatched to investigate the depths of the West Research Facility which is suspected to have been compromised by the Devil’s Garden.

Now he must escape using the Ludic Foundation's prototype Gravity Boots which allow him to walk on many surfaces, reach high places, and even fling himself through the air!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+ (Good luck other distros lmao)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Processor (SSE2 instruction set support)
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 4.0 Compatible
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

name: >HAL_4 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Processor (SSE2 instruction set support)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: >HAL_4 is a singleplayer action-puzzle horror game. Solve puzzles and escape death-traps using the wall-crawling power of your Gravity Boots which allow you to walk on many surfaces, reach high places, and even fling yourself through the air! [DEMO_AVAILABLE]
